page.title: 02The area of Stockwood
page.content: There are two parks in{Stockwood,}one behind{Burnbush school}has a BMX track that was recently built. Not many use it now because the latest interest is Break dancing. The park also is covered by broken glass, tin cans and rubbish. The playground apparatus is broken. The roundabout is falling to bits, the swings are all tied up on the top bar. The local public house is called The Antelope. There is also a new library and three Chinese take-away shops.{Saint Silas,}the Boy's club, has its own outdoor five-a-side football pitch with flood lights, all provided by voluntary means. Now it is in poor condition with a lot of rubbish about. There is also an annual carnival where the entrance fee is 10p. for children and 20p. for adults.
